Class Summary
MmAppController This is the application controller for the EODiSP model manager application.
MmFederatesController  
 

Package org.eodisp.ui.mm.controllers Description

Provides all controllers for the model manager application.

Controllers are responsible for creating views and models and connect them together. It will only create those components that will be handled by the specific controller. Handling means updating the currently active view depending on the current state of the application and also means to handle events performed by the interaction interface. It only handles the events that are registered by one of its managed views.

There are two distinguished types of controllers:

  • An application controller. It is responsible for creating all other controller. For the model manager application, this is the MmAppController.
  • All other controllers. These controllers are responsible for the tasks described above.
